Package Description
org.drip.learning.regularization

org.drip.learning.rxtor1

  • Classes in org.drip.learning.regularization used by org.drip.learning.regularization
    Class Description
    RegularizerR1ToR1
    RegularizerR1ToR1 exposes the Structural Loss and Risk for the specified Normed R1 To Normed R1 Learning Function.
    RegularizerRdToR1
    RegularizerRdToR1 exposes the Structural Loss and Risk for the specified Normed Rd To Normed R1 Learning Function.
  • Classes in org.drip.learning.regularization used by org.drip.learning.rxtor1
    Class Description
    RegularizationFunction
    RegularizerFunction the R1 To R1 and the Rd To R1 Regularization Functions.
